name: Save new PHP Point of Sale sales to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new sale is created in PHP Point of Sale, Make will automatically add it to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nR3GseY_h8yecNucI1J_os_LRyk0iVfsFzk-uJdawiQ/edit?usp=sharing).
